name: No BREAK delivery
description:
In this game you are a package deliverer on a TIGHT schedule.
Which means you'll have no need for brakes, right?
Drive through the city while shooting the packages at the right person.

Controls:
- W/S: switch gears
- A/D: steer left & right
- E: switch between 1st/3d person view
- H: honk horn

-Programmers:
Lars Smet
Rutger Hertoghe
Myrthe Lodewyckx

-Art
Xander Van Wassenhove
Ruben Verhelst
